data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.

resultPayload.note: Analytics outcome verified from reporting endpoint.

data.instruction: Query reporting endpoints relevant to this UC and confirm metrics answer the UC business question.
data.expectedResult: Reports expose reliable KPI data that matches lifecycle actions in this run.

resultPayload.note: Analytics outcome verified from reporting endpoint.
